## Load weather data set

```{r}
library(p8105.datasets)
data("weather_df")

weather_df = 
  weather_df |> 
  mutate(month = lubridate::floor_date(date, unit = "month"))

```


## `group_by`

```{r}
weather_df |> 
  group_by(name, month) |> 
  ungroup()

```
